inclusion.criterion: Age of parent/person with parental responsibility being at least 16 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinically well parent/person with parental responsibility
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient is a 47-year-old Asian woman complaining of persistent feelings of sadness and loss of interest in activities. She has no history of drug use or smoking, but her husband was recently diagnosed with colon cancer.
